characterDescription:
Gift is Rock's sixteen-year-old son and one of his two eldest children; his twin is his sister, Cord.
Gift has been taught lowlander languages and manages a passable greeting to the members of Bridge Four in Alethi.
Rlain feels sorry for Gift because he barely speaks the Alethi language, though he is - oddly - Vorin.

characterDetails.Appearance:
When Rock left the Horneater Peaks, Gift was was short like Skar. Now, he is nearly his father's height.
He is pale-skinned, and wears a glyphward tied to his arm.
characterDetails.Characteristics: He burns prayers to the Vorin Almighty, instead of making offerings to the Horneater spren.
